items.title: Songs that remind you of a time and place
items.summary: My thoughts on songs that remind you of a time and place
items.content_text:
In December 2019, I started compiling monthly playlists. The goal was to create a kind of musical diary, a playlist for a specific time in my life. It’s fun to reflect on songs that you listen to, and the memories just all come back to you. This is something I’ve noted to myself in my head for a while, although I wish I’d started creating playlists earlier.
June 2012, sitting in my uncle’s car as we drove from Yizhuang to the city center.
September 2016, on the bus to school, I listened to this album every day for a week straight.
August 2019, in the cab home after a night out in Sanlitun.
March 2020, on the bus to the airport after my college announced classes were suspended:
December 2021, when I graduated college.
February 2022, when I moved to NYC.
August 2022, driving down the Pacific Coast Highway on the way from Malibu to Santa Monica.

In December 2019, I started compiling monthly playlists. The goal was to create a kind of musical diary, a playlist for a specific time in my life. It’s fun to reflect on songs that you listen to, and the memories just all come back to you. This is something I’ve noted to myself in my head for a while, although I wish I’d started creating playlists earlier.

June 2012, sitting in my uncle’s car as we drove from Yizhuang to the city center.

September 2016, on the bus to school, I listened to this album every day for a week straight.

August 2019, in the cab home after a night out in Sanlitun.

March 2020, on the bus to the airport after my college announced classes were suspended:

December 2021, when I graduated college.

February 2022, when I moved to NYC.

August 2022, driving down the Pacific Coast Highway on the way from Malibu to Santa Monica.

items.title: Every match I watched in person at the US Open
items.content_text:
2021 # Fall break in NYC! Went back to Ithaca, then drove back down again for the final.
Carlos Alcaraz vs Stefanos Tsitsipas | 2021 US Open Round 3 Leylah Fernandez vs Naomi Osaka | 2021 US Open Round 3 Mixed Doubles Final | Krawczyk/Salisbury vs Olmos/Arevalo | 2021 US Open Emma Raducanu vs Leylah Fernandez Highlights | 2021 US Open Final 2022 # No more driving 5 hours upstate!
Hradecka/Noskova vs. Williams/Williams | 2022 US Open Round 1 Fabio Fognini vs. Rafael Nadal | 2022 US Open Round 2 Petra Kvitova vs. Jessica Pegula | 2022 US Open Round 4 Frances Tiafoe vs. Rafael Nadal | 2022 US Open Round 4 Iga Swiatek vs. Jule Niemeier | 2022 US Open Round 4 Victoria Azarenka vs. Karolina Pliskova | 2022 US Open Round 4
items.content_html:
2021 #

Fall break in NYC! Went back to Ithaca, then drove back down again for the final.

  • Carlos Alcaraz vs Stefanos Tsitsipas | 2021 US Open Round 3
  • Leylah Fernandez vs Naomi Osaka | 2021 US Open Round 3
  • Mixed Doubles Final | Krawczyk/Salisbury vs Olmos/Arevalo | 2021 US Open
  • Emma Raducanu vs Leylah Fernandez Highlights | 2021 US Open Final

2022 #

No more driving 5 hours upstate!

  • Hradecka/Noskova vs. Williams/Williams | 2022 US Open Round 1
  • Fabio Fognini vs. Rafael Nadal | 2022 US Open Round 2
  • Petra Kvitova vs. Jessica Pegula | 2022 US Open Round 4
  • Frances Tiafoe vs. Rafael Nadal | 2022 US Open Round 4
  • Iga Swiatek vs. Jule Niemeier | 2022 US Open Round 4
  • Victoria Azarenka vs. Karolina Pliskova | 2022 US Open Round 4
